H0.text: who wrote the song oh lord wo n 't you buy me a mercedes benz. Janis Joplin

H1.text: who wrote the song oh lord wo n 't you buy me a mercedes benz. Kris Kristofferson

H2.text: who wrote the song oh lord wo n 't you buy me a mercedes benz. John Prine

H3.text: who wrote the song oh lord wo n 't you buy me a mercedes benz. Bob Neuwirth

A4.text: Neuwirth was noted for being the road manager and associate of Bob Dylan, as well as the co‑writer of Janis Joplin's hit song 'Mercedes Benz'.

A5.text: With Janis Joplin and poet Michael McClure, Neuwirth co‑wrote the song 'Mercedes Benz' in August 1970, while improvising during a drinking session at a bar in Port Chester, New York.
